description: Workflow for Purrfect Pets API app managing pet data fetching, storing, filtering, and adoption.
name: purrfect_pets_workflow

transitions.description: Fetch pet data from external Petstore API and store internally
transitions.end_state_description: Pets data has been fetched and stored
transitions.name: fetch_pets_data

externalized_processors.description: Fetch pet data from external API
externalized_processors.name: process_fetch

transitions.description: Filter stored pets by status and category
transitions.end_state_description: Stored pets have been filtered by criteria
transitions.name: filter_stored_pets
transitions.start_state_description: Pets data has been fetched and stored

transitions.description: Adopt a pet by marking it as sold
transitions.end_state_description: A pet has been adopted and status updated
transitions.name: adopt_pet
transitions.start_state_description: Stored pets have been filtered by criteria
